member.name: T:InsuranceRight.Services.AddressService.Controllers.AddressLookupController
member.summary: Controller for validating zipcodes and getting full address details

member.name: M:InsuranceRight.Services.AddressService.Controllers.AddressLookupController.ValidateZipcode(InsuranceRight.Services.Models.Foundation.ZipCode)
member.returns: ReturnObject including ErrorMessage(s) if the request was invalid

member.name: M:InsuranceRight.Services.AddressService.Controllers.AddressLookupController.GetFullAddress(InsuranceRight.Services.Models.Foundation.Address)
member.summary: Method for getting the full details of an address
member.param: Incomplete Address to fill with details
member.returns: ReturnObject including ErrorMessage(s) if request was invalid, and an object which will include all details if request is valid

member.name: M:InsuranceRight.Services.AddressService.Repositories.DefaultAddressLookup.IsZipCodeValid(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if zipCode is valid, based on _validZipCodes list
member.param: An optional custom regex pattern which the zipcode must conform to in order to be checked
member.returns: True: zipcode is valid || False: if invalid or doesn't match regex pattern
